ValidationRule.description: An item cannot be marked Approved (and therefore sent to Finance) with a blank or "TBD" description.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: ISPICKVAL( Payment_Status__c , "Approved") && OR( ISBLANK( TEXT(Expense_Category__c)), OR( ISBLANK(Description__c), CONTAINS(LOWER(Description__c), "tbd") ), NOT(Expense_Amount__c>0) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Cannot approve for payment without providing an Expense Category, Description and Expense Amount.
